title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Monthly Services Inquiry)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Monthly Services Inquiry) 

Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (monthly service inquiry) order 2023

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“inquiry” means the Monthly Services Inquiry that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in the 
Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation, in so 
far as it relates to Annex D thereto; 
“Regulation” means Council Regulation (EC) No. 1165/98 of 19 May 19981, 
amended by Regulation (EC) No. 1158/2005 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 6 July 20052, Commission Regulation (EC) No. 1503/2006 of 
28 September 20063, Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20064, Commission Regulation 
(EC) No. 1178/2008 of 28 November 20085, Commission Regulation (EC) No. 
329/2009 of 22 April 20096, Regulation (EC) No. 596/2009 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 20097 and Commission Regulation 
(EU) No. 461/2012 of 31 May 20128. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires. 

1 OJ No. L 162 5.6.1998, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 191, 22.7.2005, p. 1 
3 OJ No. L 281, 12.10.2006, p. 15 
4 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
5 OJ No. L 319, 29.11.2008, p. 16 
6 OJ No. L 103, 23.4.2009, p. 3 
7 OJ No. L 188, 18.7.2009, p. 14 
8 OJ No. L 142, 1.6.2012, p. 26 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [509] 3

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified 
for statistical purposes under division 45 or 46 or section H, I, J, K, L, M, N, P, 
Q, R or S of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 
20064, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20089, Regulation (EU) No. 
70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 201210, 
and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 20 June 201911.

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose
heading: 4. A requirement on persons to whom, or undertakings to which, this
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons to whom, or undertakings to which, this 
Order applies to provide, for the purposes of the inquiry, information the 
general nature of which is specified in the Schedule, once only in relation to 
the months of November 2023 and December 2023, is hereby prescribed. 

9 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
10 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
11 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [509]
text_norm: 4 requirement person undertaking order applies provide purpose inquiry information general nature specified schedule relation month november 2023 december 2023 hereby prescribed 9 oj no l 97 9.4.2008 p 13 10 oj no l 32 3.2.2012 p 1 11 oj no l 198 25.7.2019 p 241 4 509

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose
heading: Article 4

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose
heading: Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or
text_raw:
1. 

Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or 
undertaking concerned, and specifying the month to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

the total value, excluding VAT, of turnover; 

the total value, excluding VAT, of turnover of sales via the 
internet.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates person undertaking concerned specifying month information relates (a) (b) total value excluding vat turnover total value excluding vat turnover sale via internet

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose
heading: Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned 
to complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 October, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
